name: DARKLORD - An Arcade Platformer
description:
DARKLORD

In a universe far different from our own, there lives a powerful being of pure evil magic bent on conquering all known realities. He is known as the Darklord. You play as Billy Pilgrim, an inter dimensional commando sent on a mission to defeat the Darklord and his army once and for all. Do you have what it takes to survive the traps of the Darklord! Dodge Fireballs! Kick Enemies! Only you can save the day!

FEATURES
High Quality 64-bit pixel shader technology renders a gameworld unlike any ever seen before. See beads of sweat drip down Billy Pilgrim's face as accurately simulated fireballs fly by in Stereoscopic 4D.

Advanced Enemy Simulation: You will feel as if the enemies are right next to you.

Hit the bricks! Knock the badguys out and kill them!

Z to jump
Arrow keys to move
Enter pauses the game
Multiplayer!!! (Requires an XBOX 360 controller)

TIPS

To defeat the Darklord, try collecting an invulnerability powerup.

The Skeletron enemy takes two hits to kill!
